title: Mushroom and Gouda cheese quiche
ingredients: ['1 sheet shortcrust pastry', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 vegetable stock cube, crumbled', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '250g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '4 eggs, beaten', '100ml single cream', '200g Gouda cheese, grated']
